TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlDataDocument extends System.Xml.XmlDocument

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("XmlDataDocument class will be removed in a future release.")

summary.span: 允許透過關聯式 存放、擷取及管理結構化資料。

span.span: Allows structured data to be stored, retrieved, and manipulated through a relational .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此類別會擴充。This class extends . 它可讓您載入關聯式資料或 XML 資料和操作資料使用 World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 文件物件模型 (DOM)。It enables you to load either relational data or XML data and manipulate that data using the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Document Object Model (DOM). DOM 會將資料呈現成節點物件的階層架構。The DOM presents data as a hierarchy of node objects. 因為`XmlDataDocument`會實作介面，它也可用來當做來源文件的類別。Because `XmlDataDocument` implements the interface, it can also be used as the source document for the class. `XmlDataDocument` 已關閉其關聯`DataSet`類別，可提供載入的 XML 資料的關聯式檢視。`XmlDataDocument` has a close affiliation with the `DataSet` class, which provides a relational view of the loaded XML data. 所做的變更`XmlDataDocument`會反映在`DataSet`，反之亦然。Any changes made to the `XmlDataDocument` are reflected in the `DataSet` and vice versa. 若要載入`DataSet`XML 資料，使用來建置關聯式的對應。To load a `DataSet` with XML data, use to build a relational mapping. XML 資料可以再使用載入或。The XML data can then be loaded using or . 若要載入的關聯式資料，請指定`DataSet`做為參數中包含關聯式資料建構函式。To load relational data, specify the `DataSet` containing the relational data as the parameter in the constructor.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

summary.span: 使用指定的 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `XmlDataDocument`同步處理具有指定`DataSet`。The `XmlDataDocument` is synchronized with the specified `DataSet`. 中的任何資料`DataSet`立即可透過`XmlDataDocument`。Any data in the `DataSet` is immediately available through the `XmlDataDocument`. 中的任何變更`DataSet`傳播中`XmlDataDocument`。Any changes in the `DataSet` are propagated in the `XmlDataDocument`. 中的變更`XmlDataDocument`，前提是兩者相符`DataSet`結構描述中，會傳播`DataSet`。Any changes made in the `XmlDataDocument`, provided they match the `DataSet` schema, are propagated in the `DataSet`. ## Examples 下列範例會載入至 customer 資料表`XmlDataDocument`。The following example loads a customer table into an `XmlDataDocument`. 此範例會使用 SQL Server 2000 的 Northwind 資料庫。The example uses the SQL Server 2000 Northwind database. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.XmlDataDocument1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.XmlDataDocument1 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.XmlDataDocument1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.XmlDataDocument1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.XmlDataDocument1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.XmlDataDocument1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Xml.XmlNode CloneNode (bool deep);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Xml.XmlNode CloneNode(bool deep) cil managed
Public Overrides Function CloneNode (deep As Boolean) As XmlNode
public: override System::Xml::XmlNode ^ CloneNode(bool deep);
abstract member CloneNode : bool -> System.Xml.XmlNode override this.CloneNode : bool -> System.Xml.XmlNode

param.name: deep
param.span: 若要在指定的節點下遞迴地複製子樹狀結構，則為 ；若只要複製節點本身，則為 。

span.span: to recursively clone the subtree under the specified node; to clone only the node itself.

summary.span: 建立目前節點的複本。

span.span: Creates a duplicate of the current node.
The cloned node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 複製`XmlDataDocument`也會複製結構描述。Cloning the `XmlDataDocument` also clones the schema. 如果`deep`設定為`false`，複製`DataSet`有任何資料; 也就是說，沒有任何資料列。If `deep` is set to `false`, the cloned `DataSet` has no data; that is, no rows. 如果`deep`設定為`true`，複製`DataSet`設定與結構描述，並接著填入資料。If `deep` is set to `true`, the cloned `DataSet` is set with the schema and then populated with the data. 請參閱在`XmlNode`類別，以查看描述這個方法與每個不同的節點類型的行為。See in the `XmlNode` class to see a table describing how this method behaves with each of the different node types. ## Examples 下列範例會載入`DataSet`成`XmlDataDocument`，然後再建立的淺層複製`XmlDataDocument`。The following example loads a `DataSet` into an `XmlDataDocument` and then creates a shallow clone of the `XmlDataDocument`. 此範例會使用 SQL Server 2000 的 Northwind 資料庫。The example uses the SQL Server 2000 Northwind database. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.CloneNode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.CloneNode Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.CloneNode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.CloneNode Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.CloneNode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.CloneNode Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `XPathNavigator`提供唯讀隨機存取資料。The `XPathNavigator` provides read-only, random access to data. 因為它適合的 XSLT 轉換，它會提供效能優勢時做為輸入機制方法。Because it is optimized for XSLT transformations, it provides performance benefits when used as an input mechanism to the method. ## Examples 若要查看使用您建立 XSLT 轉換`XmlDataDocument`並`XPathNavigator`，請參閱方法。To see an XSLT transformation using `XmlDataDocument` and an `XPathNavigator`, see the method.

summary.span: 取得提供 中之資料的關聯式表示的 。

span.span: Gets a that provides a relational representation of the data in the .

value.span: ，可以利用關聯式模型以用於存取 中的資料。

span.span: A that can be used to access the data in the using a relational model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `DataSet`可讓您存取中的資料`XmlDataDocument`使用關聯式模型。The `DataSet` enables you to access the data in the `XmlDataDocument` using a relational model. 這表示您可以用來做為資料表和檢視表、 資料列和資料行、 關聯，來處理資料，並依此類推。This means that you can handle the data as tables and views, rows and columns, relations, and so on. 在中所做的變更`DataSet`會立即顯示在`XmlDataDocument`。Changes made in the `DataSet` are immediately visible in the `XmlDataDocument`. ## Examples 下列範例會修改活頁簿使用價格`DataSet`方法。The following example modifies the price of a book using the `DataSet` methods. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.DataSet Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.DataSet Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.DataSet Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.DataSet Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.DataSet Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.DataSet Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 此範例會使用下列兩個檔案，做為輸入。The example uses the following two files as input. `2books.xml` [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.DataSet Example#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.DataSet Example/XML/source.xml#2)] `store.xsd` [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.DataSet Example#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.DataSet Example/XML/source.xml#3)]

[!code-cpp[XmlDataDocument.GetRowFromElement#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlDataDocument.GetRowFromElement/CPP/getrow.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlDataDocument.GetRowFromElement#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlDataDocument.GetRowFromElement/CS/getrow.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlDataDocument.GetRowFromElement#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlDataDocument.GetRowFromElement/VB/getrow.vb#1)] 此範例會使用下列的輸入的檔案：The example uses the following input files: `2books.xml` [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.DataSet Example#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.DataSet Example/XML/source.xml#2)] `store.xsd` [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.DataSet Example#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.DataSet Example/XML/source.xml#3)]

summary.span: 使用指定的資料來源載入 ，並且將 與載入的資料同步。

span.span: Loads the using the specified data source and synchronizes the with the loaded data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 若要達成檢視 XML 資料，您必須先指定要用於資料對應的結構描述。In order to view the XML data relationally, you must first specify a schema to use for data mapping. 這可以藉由呼叫方法或藉由建立資料表和資料行內`DataSet`以手動方式。This can be done either by calling the method or by creating the tables and columns within the `DataSet` manually. 必須完成這個步驟，然後再呼叫`Load`。This step must be done before calling `Load`. `XmlDataDocument` 不支援建立的實體參考。`XmlDataDocument` does not support creating entity references. 如果資料包含實體參考`Load`方法可以解決和展開任何實體參考。If the data includes entity references, the `Load` method resolves and expands any entity references. 不過，如果您使用`Load`採用多載做為引數，您必須指定`XmlReader`，可以解析實體。However, if you are using the `Load` overload that takes a as an argument, you must specify an `XmlReader` that can resolve entities.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `XmlDataDocument` 不支援建立的實體參考。`XmlDataDocument` does not support creating entity references. 如果資料包含實體參考`Load`方法可以解決和展開任何實體參考。If the data includes entity references, the `Load` method resolves and expands any entity references. > [!NOTE] > 若要達成檢視 XML 資料，您必須先指定要用於資料對應的結構描述。In order to view the XML data relationally, you must first specify a schema to use for data mapping. 這可以藉由呼叫方法或藉由建立資料表和資料行內`DataSet`以手動方式。This can be done either by calling the method or by creating the tables and columns within the `DataSet` manually. 必須完成這個步驟，然後再呼叫`Load`。This step must be done before calling `Load`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `XmlDataDocument` 不支援建立的實體參考。`XmlDataDocument` does not support creating entity references. 如果資料來源包含實體參考，您必須建立具有屬性設為 EntityHandling.ExpandEntities （這是預設行為），並傳遞`XmlValidatingReader`到`Load`方法。If the data source contains entity references, you must create an with the property set to EntityHandling.ExpandEntities (this is the default behavior) and pass the `XmlValidatingReader` to the `Load` method. 如果您不要使用`XmlValidatingReader`，則`Load`方法會擲回的例外狀況。If you do not use an `XmlValidatingReader`, the `Load` method throws an exception. `Load`方法一律會保留顯著泛空白字元。The `Load` method always preserves significant white space. 屬性會決定是否要保留空白字元。The property determines whether or not white space is preserved. 預設值是`false`，不保留空白字元。The default is `false`, white space is not preserved. 如果讀取器中的初始狀態 (也就是 ReadState=ReadState.Initial)`Load`使用讀取器的整個內容，並建置它所找到的 DOM。If the reader is in the initial state (that is, ReadState=ReadState.Initial), `Load` consumes the entire contents of the reader and builds the DOM from what it finds. 如果器已經在深度"n"名的某個節點上，這個方法會載入該節點，然後關閉深度"n 名"的結束標記到所有後續的同層級。If the reader is already positioned on some node at depth "n", then this method loads that node and all subsequent siblings up to the end tag that closes depth "n". 這有下列的結果。This has the following results. 如果目前節點和其下的同層級看起來如下所示：If the current node and its following siblings look similar to the following: ```xml onetwo ``` `Load` 因為文件不能有兩個根層級項目，則會擲回的例外狀況。`Load` throws an exception, because a document cannot have two root-level elements. 如果目前節點和其下的同層級看起來如下所示：If the current node and its following siblings look similar to the following: ```xml ``` `Load` 將會成功;不過，您將不完整的 DOM 樹狀目錄中，因為沒有根層級項目。`Load` will succeed; however, you will have an incomplete DOM tree, because there is no root-level element. 您必須先儲存文件，加入根層級項目否則，方法會擲回的例外狀況。You have to add a root-level element before you save the document; otherwise, the method throws an exception. 如果將讀取器置於對文件之根層級而言是無效的分葉節點 (例如，泛空白字元或屬性節點) 上，則讀取器會繼續讀取，直到將其置於可用於根層級的節點上。If the reader is positioned on a leaf node that is invalid for the root level of a document (for example, a white space or attribute node), the reader continues to read until it is positioned on a node that can be used for the root. 此時文件會開始載入。The document begins loading at this point. ## Examples 下列範例會修改活頁簿使用價格`DataSet`方法。The following example modifies the price of a book using the `DataSet` methods. [!code-cpp[XmlDataDocument.Load#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlDataDocument.Load/CPP/loadrdr.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlDataDocument.Load#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlDataDocument.Load/CS/loadrdr.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlDataDocument.Load#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlDataDocument.Load/VB/loadrdr.vb#1)] 此範例會使用下列兩個輸入的檔案。The example uses the following two input files. `2books.xml` [!code-xml[XmlDataDocument.Load#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlDataDocument.Load/XML/2books.xml#2)] `store.xsd` [!code-xml[XmlDataDocument.Load#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlDataDocument.Load/XML/test.xsd#3)]

exception.span: 載入的 XML 包含實體參考，並且讀取器不能解析實體。

span.span: The XML being loaded contains entity references, and the reader cannot resolve entities.
